page.title: 17Lymm's French Connection 2
page.content: In Meung's neighbouring town of Beaugency Angling and football clubs have also had an enjoyable exchanges and matches.Meung is near the heart of France,lying about half-way between Orleans and Blois in the beautifull Loire valley.It is there- fore very convenient for visits to many of the great chateaux of the area.Meung itself is a small market town.It has a population of about 5,000 but is far more of a centre for surroundings villages than is Lymm.The major attractions of the town are its position on the Loire, its old church and its chateau which date in part from the eleventh century.
